item.title: TIL 04.12.2019
item.description: Until now, I did the following to wait for a process: $ wait $pid The above does only work for child processes (stared by the same shell). The hack works for any processes: $ tail --pid=$pid -f /dev/null Learned from to StackOverflow answer.
